I utilized my skills in developing and refactoring multiple features in several apps using TypeScript and tools that are part of high-scale development in web applications. I also worked alongside a group of professionals responsible for defining and creating standards and processes for the companyâ€™s web applications. In addition as a core member of the company's inner source design system, I was an advocate of the library and responsible for the engineering solutions as well as its maintenance.

FeedData.title: Student Ambassador, AWS Educate
FeedData.description: Dedicated to introducing students in my local community to the powerful tools and resources available on the Amazon Web Services platform. By sharing my knowledge and promoting events, webinars, and courses, I aimed to create opportunities for students to learn and grow in the field of cloud computing.

FeedData.title: Co-founder, UFRPE Devs
FeedData.description: The organization aims to foster an inclusive community dedicated to sharing information and resources related to open-source software development and culture. By creating an open space for collaboration, the organization encourages the exchange of ideas and knowledge among individuals with diverse backgrounds and experiences.

FeedData.title: Software Engineer, Pitang Agile IT
FeedData.description: Contributed to creating innovative products for the client. My role involved web development using cutting-edge technologies such as node and JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS, Express and Angular, as well as developing services that used machine learning with Python. Additionally, I utilized the AWS as cloud computing services platform.

FeedData.title: Intern, Unu Digital
FeedData.description: As a web development intern, I worked on a single-page application using AngularJS, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I gained valuable hands-on experience in developing a RESTful API using PHP with SlimFramework and MySQL.
